abstract: The confrontation between 49ers Coach Jim Harbaugh and Lions Coach Jim Schwartz might have been stoked by an incident in the first quarter.
snippet: The confrontation between 49ers Coach Jim Harbaugh and Lions Coach Jim Schwartz might have been stoked by an incident in the first quarter.
lead_paragraph: From a transcript on the Lions' Web site: "After the game, went to shake an opponent coach's hand. Obviously you win a game like that, you're excited and things like that, but I think there's a protocol that goes with this league."Jim Schwartz

headline.main: On Schwartz, Harbaugh and Postgame Protocol
